reviews.review_msg: Birutes classes are avenues into the world of primatology. Shes organised, communicates through twitter, and doesnt spoon feed students. She rewards independent research, meaning that you must actually do something to attain a good grade. Her lectures are informative and interspersed with interesting anecdotes from a lifetime in the field.

ARCH 331-PrehistoryBC All Rob wants to know is that you learned something from his lecture. Make sure you spend some time memorizing the map he covers in the beginning of the lecture for the map quiz. Midterm and final are easy. Just write everything you learned from the lecture and try to make them relevant to the questions, and you will do great!
